publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-893.2 Mr Brian Monteith: Mike Tyson—As an amendment to motion (S1M-893) in the name of Mrs Mary Mulligan, leave out from "calls upon" to end and insert "believes that it is for the commercial managers of Scotland’s national stadium to determine what events should be held at that venue so long as the promoters and participants of any such event meet with the local and national licensing and legislative requirements."
